radiographic_examinations.findings: Obvious patchy shadows in both lungs.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Emergency brain CT revealed hematoceles in both lateral ventricles and hemorrhage in the right paraoccipital lobe that had ruptured the lateral ventricle on day 14.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral patchy shadows and diffuse infiltration with extensive consolidation in the right lung.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial repeat chest CT indicated hydrothorax and relief of bilateral exudation, but later revealed new patchy shadows in the right upper lung.
